The original Parasite vid established a new face of fear and terrified the Empire. This iconic look can now be yours with the Parasite Replica helmet from CC's Conversions. Digital scans of the original prop helped to reproduce every gruesome detail. Despite its distinct design, the Parasite Replica helmet is space-rated and fully functional. It can be safely worn both in and out of atmosphere, or wherever you're looking to scare someone.
